title: Searching For Supernovae
content:
Use the arrow buttons to blink through the images. When you find the supernova, click on its location in the image.

You can determine the type of supernova by overlaying supernovae light curve templates.

question.label: What type of supernova do you think this is? Explain your answerâ€”which aspects of the shape of the light curve caused you to choose this type?
